statements: DELETE FROM Partnerships WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp' AND partnership_type = 'Client';
DELETE FROM Partnerships WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp' AND partnership_type = 'Supplier' AND partnership_start_date > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM partnerships WHERE organization_name = 'Company A' AND partnership_type = 'Strategic'
DELETE FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'Joint venture' AND collaboration_start_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM project_partners WHERE project_id = 1 AND partner_id = 3;
DELETE FROM project_collaborations WHERE collaboration_id = 5 AND project_id = 2;
